scripts.build: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.build.native: echo 'skipping build-native script because its not currently needed'
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run build && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run build && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --bundle
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --bundle
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-secure-storage && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
